attributes.action: Question Lucy Allen MP on social media activities in interests of constuents
attributes.background: Lucy Allen doctored/changed an email to make it seem like she was receiving a death threat, she then posted a cartoon mocking that person. She also ignores some of the constituents she serves for not supporting what she supports and is just rude

rejection.details: Comments made by individual MPs on social media aren't the responsibility of the Government or the House of Commons as a whole.
